SA10bsa021_u:1: Vv_1 sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaścet /
SA10bsa021_u:3: Vv_2 atha sasvabhāvametadvākyaṃ śrutvā hatā pratijñā te /
SA10bsa021_u:5: Vv_3 mā śabdavadityetat syātte buddhirna caitadupapannam /
SA10bsa021_u:7: Vv_4 pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣeddhyo 'pyevamiti mataṃ bhavet tadasadeva /
SA10bsa021_u:8: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṇato duṣyate na mama //
SA10bsa021_u:9: Vv_5 pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvan yadyupalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
SA10bsa021_u:15: Vv_8 nairyāṇikasvabhāvo dharmo nairyāṇikāśca ye teṣām /
SA10bsa021_u:17: Vv_9 yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ityevam /
SA10bsa021_u:19: Vv_10 atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
SA10bsa021_u:20: dharmairvinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasyāsti tad yuktamupadeṣṭum //
SA10bsa021_u:21: Vv_11 sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ityayaṃ yasmāt /
SA10bsa021_u:22: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho 'yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt //
SA10bsa021_u:23: Vv_12 atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kiṃ nu pratividhyate tvayānena /
SA10bsa021_u:25: Vv_13 bālānāmiva mithyā mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ yathā jalagrāhaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:27: Vv_14 nanvevaṃ satyasti grāho grāhyaṃ ca tagdṛhītaṃ ca /
SA10bsa021_u:28: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat //
SA10bsa021_u:29: Vv_15 atha naivāsti grāho na ca grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:30: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāro 'sya tu na santi //
SA10bsa021_u:31: Vv_16 pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāraśca yadyuta na santi /
SA10bsa021_u:33: Vv_17 hetostato na siddhirnaiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:35: Vv_18 yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /
SA10bsa021_u:38: loke naiḥsvābhāvyānna hi kaścana vidyate bhāvaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:39: Vv_20 pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyamiti ca nopapannam /
SA10bsa021_u:41: Vv_21 hetupratyayasāmagryāṃ pṛthagbhāve 'pi madvaco na yadi /
SA10bsa021_u:43: Vv_22 yaśca pratītya bhāvo bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti sā hyuktā /
SA10bsa021_u:44: yaśca pratītya bhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvam //
SA10bsa021_u:45: Vv_23 nirmitako nirmitakaṃ māyāpuruṣaḥ svamāyayā sṛṣṭam /
SA10bsa021_u:47: Vv_24 na svābhāvikametad vākyaṃ tasmānna vādahānirme /
SA10bsa021_u:48: nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśeṣahetuśca na nigadyaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:49: Vv_25 mā śabdavaditi nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yastvayā mamārabdhaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:50: śabdena hi tacca śabdasya vāraṇaṃ naiva me vacaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:51: Vv_26 naiḥsvābhāvyānāṃ cennaiḥsvābhāvyena vāraṇaṃ yadi hi /
SA10bsa021_u:53: Vv_27 athavā nirmitakāyāṃ yathā striyāṃ striyamityasaṃgrāham /
SA10bsa021_u:55: Vv_28 athavā sādhyasamo 'yaṃ heturna hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /
SA10bsa021_u:57: Vv_29 yadi kācana pratijñā tatra syādeṣa me bhaveddoṣaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:58: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmānnaivāsti me doṣaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:59: Vv_30 yadi kiṃcidupalabheyaṃ pravartayeyaṃ nivartayeyaṃ vā /
SA10bsa021_u:61: Vv_31 yadi ca pramāṇatasteṣāṃ teṣāṃ prasiddhirarthānām /
SA10bsa021_u:62: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ te pramāṇānām //
SA10bsa021_u:71: Vv_37 yadi ca svaparātmānau tvadvacanena prakāśayatyagniḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:73: Vv_38 nāsti tamaśca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhati sadātmani jvalanaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:74: kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo 'ndhakāravadhaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:76: utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:77: Vv_40 aprāpto 'pi jvalano yadi vā punarandhakāramupahanyāt /
SA10bsa021_u:79: Vv_41 yadi ca svataḥpramāṇasiddhiranapekṣya te prameyāṇi /
SA10bsa021_u:81: Vv_42 anapekṣya hi prameyānarthān yadi te pramāṇasiddhiḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:83: Vv_43 atha matamapekṣya siddhisteṣāmityatra ko doṣaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:85: Vv_44 sidhyanti hi prameyāṇyapekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni /
SA10bsa021_u:87: Vv_45 yadi ca prameyasiddhiranapekṣyaiva bhavati pramāṇāni /
SA10bsa021_u:88: kiṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yadarthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tat //
SA10bsa021_u:89: Vv_46 atha tu pramāṇasiddhirbhavatyapekṣyaiva te prameyāṇi /
SA10bsa021_u:90: vyatyaya evaṃ sati te dhruvaṃ pramāṇaprameyāṇām //
SA10bsa021_u:91: Vv_47 atha tai pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhiḥ prameyasiddhyā cā
SA10bsa021_u:93: Vv_48 sidhyanti hi pramāṇairyadi prameyāṇi tāni taireva /
SA10bsa021_u:95: Vv_49 sidhyanti ca prameyairyadi pramāṇāni tāni taireva /
SA10bsa021_u:97: Vv_50 pitrā yadyutpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa /
SA10bsa021_u:98: utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kam //
SA10bsa021_u:99: Vv_51 kaśca pitā kaḥ putrastatra tvaṃ brūhi tāvubhāvapi ca /
SA10bsa021_u:102: bhavati na ca prameyairna cāpyakasmāt pramāṇānām //
SA10bsa021_u:103: Vv_53 kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmāvasthāvidho brūvate yat /
SA10bsa021_u:105: Vv_54 yadi ca pratītya kuśalaḥ svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10bsa021_u:106: dharmāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ svabhāva evaṃ kathaṃ bhavati //
SA10bsa021_u:107: Vv_55 atha na pratītya kiṃcit svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10bsa021_u:109: Vv_56 nādharmo dharmo vā saṃvyavahārāśca laukikā na syuḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:111: Vv_57 eṣa cākuśaleḥvavyākṛteḥu nairyāṇādiḥu ca doḥaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:113: Vv_58 yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāma brūyāt sa svabhāva ityevam /
SA10bsa021_u:114: bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaśca na vyaṃ sat //
SA10bsa021_u:115: Vv_59 nāmāsaditi ca yadidaṃ tatkiṃ nu sato bhavatyutāsataḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:116: yadi hi sato yadyasato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:117: Vv_60 sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ śūnyatvaṃ copapāditaṃ pūrvam /
SA10bsa021_u:119: Vv_61 atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyata iti /
SA10bsa021_u:121: Vv_62 sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanvapratiṣiddhamidam /
SA10bsa021_u:123: Vv_63 pratiṣedhayase 'tha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tacca nāsti śūnyatvam /
SA10bsa021_u:124: pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanvevaṃ hīyate vādaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:125: Vv_64 pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiṃcit pratiṣedhyamasti na ca kiṃcit /
SA10bsa021_u:129: Vv_66 mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte yaḥ punaruktaṃ tvayā mahāṃścaryaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:130: tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:131: Vv_67 sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syāt bhāvo na syāt pratītyasamudbhūtaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:132: yaśca pratītya bhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva //
SA10bsa021_u:133: Vv_68 yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kastaṃ nivartayed grāhyam /
SA10bsa021_u:135: Vv_69 etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvameva sa samatvāt /
SA10bsa021_u:137: Vv_70 yastraikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvameva sa samatvāt /
SA10bsa021_u:139: Vv_71 prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:140: prabhavati na tasya kiṃ na bhavati śūnyatā yasyeti //
SA10bsa021_u:141: Vv_72 yaḥ śūnyatāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ madhyamāṃ pratipadamanekārthām /
